title: DoorDash Delivery - Essential Vocabulary and Scenarios
description: Platform-specific communication for DoorDash delivery drivers (Dashers)

platformVocabulary.spanish: Pago pico / Bonificación de hora pico
platformVocabulary.context: Extra money per delivery during busy times
Percentage of accepted orders you complete
Required insulated bag and payment card

phrases.english: Hi, I'm here to pick up a DoorDash order for [customer name]
phrases.spanish: Hola, estoy aquí para recoger un pedido de DoorDash para [nombre del cliente]
phrases.pronunciation: OH-lah, es-TOY ah-KEE PAH-rah reh-koh-HER oon peh-DEE-doh deh DoorDash
phrases.context: First thing to say when entering restaurant

arrival.tip: Always confirm customer name matches app. Don't take wrong order

phrases.english: How much longer for the order?
phrases.pronunciation: KWAN-toh tee-EM-poh mahs PAH-rah el peh-DEE-doh
phrases.context: When order not ready at promised time

phrases.english: I'll need to notify the customer about the delay
phrases.spanish: Necesitaré notificar al cliente sobre la demora

protocol: Contact customer through app about delay
Can unassign after 10+ minutes without penalty (affects completion rate slightly)
Use 'Order not ready' option in app to document

phrases.context: Must report through app for half-pay

phrases.english: The order looks incorrect or incomplete
phrases.spanish: El pedido parece incorrecto o incompleto

orderIssues.never: NEVER open sealed food bags. Take restaurant's word that order is complete

contactlessDelivery.note: Most DoorDash orders are contactless - leave at door

phrases.english: [Text through app] Your order has been delivered to [location]. Enjoy!
phrases.spanish: Su pedido ha sido entregado en [ubicación]. ¡Buen provecho!

procedure: Take photo of food at door (required by app)
Include house number or door in photo

phrases.english: Have a great day! Enjoy your meal!

handItToMe.note: Keep interaction brief and professional - food delivery is less social than rideshare

phrases.english: [Text] I'm at your delivery address but unable to locate you. Please provide additional instructions.
phrases.spanish: Estoy en su dirección de entrega pero no puedo ubicarlo/a. Por favor provea instrucciones adicionales.
phrases.pronunciation: es-TOY en soo dee-rek-see-ON deh en-TREH-gah

protocol: When timer expires, can leave food in safe spot and complete delivery

apartments.challenges: Often hardest deliveries - vague instructions, locked gates, confusing layouts

phrases.english: [Text] I'm at the gate/lobby. What's the access code? / Which building?
phrases.spanish: Estoy en el portón/lobby. ¿Cuál es el código de acceso? / ¿Cuál edificio?

tips: Take photo of customer's delivery instructions before leaving
Use flashlight at night for building/door numbers
Don't feel bad about calling - better than wrong delivery

acceptanceRate.importance: Does NOT affect account standing (unlike completion rate)
acceptanceRate.freedom: Can decline low-pay or far-distance orders without penalty
acceptanceRate.strategy: Only accept orders that make financial sense ($1.50-2 per mile minimum)
acceptanceRate.topDasher: Need 70% acceptance rate for Top Dasher status - not always worth it

completionRate.strategy: Only accept orders you're confident you can complete

peakPay.how ItWorks: Extra $1-5 per delivery during busy times in specific zones
peakPay.catch: Can oversaturate zone with drivers - sometimes worse than no peak pay

redCardOrders.explanation: Some orders require you to pay with Red Card at restaurant
process: Order and pay at counter using Red Card

phrases.english: I'm ordering for DoorDash and paying with this card
phrases.spanish: Estoy ordenando para DoorDash y pagando con esta tarjeta

redCardOrders.issues: If Red Card declines, contact support immediately - don't use personal money

stackedOrders.pros: More money, less driving between orders
stackedOrders.strategy: Check that both deliveries are close together
stackedOrders.canDecline: Can unassign one order from stack if it's not worth it

orderSelection.hiddenTips: DoorDash hides tips above $4 - order might pay more than shown
redFlags: Orders to businesses during closed hours

hotspots.reality: Sometimes inaccurate - trust your local knowledge
hotspots.strategy: Position between multiple popular restaurants, not in hotspot center

timeManagement.scheduling: Don't need to schedule - can Dash Now during busy times

multiApping.concept: Run DoorDash, Uber Eats, Grubhub simultaneously
multiApping.strategy: Accept best-paying order from any app, pause others
multiApping.warning: Can hurt completion rate if you're not careful - don't double-book

hotBag.required: Must use insulated hot bag - customer can see if you don't in app
hotBag.benefit: Food stays hot = better tips and ratings
hotBag.multiple: Consider buying extra bags for large or multiple orders

solutions: Place in floor behind front seat (most stable)
Ask restaurant to seal lids with tape

tampering.rule: NEVER open sealed food bags or eat customer's food

noTipOrders.identification: $2-3 pay for any distance = no tip
noTipOrders.phrase: No tip, no trip (common Dasher saying)
noTipOrders.exception: If very short distance (under 1 mile) and on your route

customerRequestsChange.scenario: Customer texts asking for different item or extra item

response.english: I've already picked up your order. Please contact DoorDash support for order changes.
response.spanish: Ya recogí su pedido. Por favor contacte al soporte de DoorDash para cambios de pedido.

customerRequestsChange.rule: Don't go back to restaurant or buy extra items with your money

unsafeNeighborhoods.right: You can decline deliveries to areas where you don't feel safe
unsafeNeighborhoods.timing: Night deliveries to unfamiliar areas - trust your instincts
unsafeNeighborhoods.protection: Don't risk your safety for any amount of money

culturalNotes.note: Food delivery has less customer interaction than rideshare - most are contactless
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Much less social than Colombian delivery culture

culturalNotes.note: Hot food going cold creates urgency - customers are watching ETA in app
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Similar urgency to Colombian food delivery

culturalNotes.note: Customers pre-tip when ordering. No tip = they don't value service. Decline appropriately
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More formalized than Colombian propina system

culturalNotes.note: Being polite and patient with restaurant staff leads to faster service
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Similar to Colombian respect for food service workers

topDasherProgram.debate: Many Dashers debate if 70% acceptance rate requirement is worth it - accepting bad orders to maintain rate
